00002 #include "mainwindow.hpp"

00004 #include <KDE/KApplication>
00005 #include <KDE/KCmdLineArgs>
00006 #include <KDE/KLocale>

00008 int
00009 main(int argc, char** argv)
00010 {
00011     KAboutData aboutData("aki", 0, ki18n("Aki"), AKI_VERSION_STR,
00012                          ki18n("Extensive IRC client for KDE4."), KAboutData::License_GPL_V2,
00013                          ki18n("Copyright (c) 2009-2010 Keith Rusler"),
00014                          ki18n("IRC: irc.freenode.net - #aki\n"
00015                                "Build Data: %1 at %2")
00016                                     .subs(QLatin1String(__DATE__))
00017                                     .subs(QLatin1String(__TIME__)));
00018     aboutData.addAuthor(ki18n("Keith Rusler"), ki18n("Lead Developer"), "xzekecomax@gmail.com");
00019     aboutData.addCredit(ki18n("Lee Olson"), ki18n("Aki Icon Author"), "leetolson@gmail.com");
00020     aboutData.addCredit(ki18n("Andreas Marschke"), ki18n("Bughunter, Testing and Design"), "xxtjaxx@gmail.com");
00021 
00022     KCmdLineArgs::init(argc, argv, &aboutData);
00023 
00024     KCmdLineOptions options;
00025     options.add("+[url]", ki18n("irc:// Server URL or hostname"));
00026     options.add("server <address>", ki18n("Server address to connect"), "");
00027     options.add("port <port>", ki18n("Server port to use"), "6667");
00028     options.add("nick <nickname>", ki18n("Nickname to use"), "");
00029     options.add("pass <password>", ki18n("Password to connect"), "");
00030     options.add("ssl", ki18n("Connect using SSL"), "false");
00031     options.add("noplugins", ki18n("Do not load plugins"), "");
00032     options.add("noconnect", ki18n("Disables auto-connection"), "");
00033 
00034     KCmdLineArgs::addCmdLineOptions(options);
00035 
00036     KApplication app;
00037     MainWindow *win = new MainWindow;
00038     win->show();
00039 
00040     return KApplication::exec();
00041 }
